comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: How exciting - I believe that I own the original negative of this picture! It may be a negative copy, but I do suspect that it's the original. I also have a second image of the same group. I have been told by the Royal Academy that it was taken in Burlington House, but the catalogue suggests it was actually at The New Gallery, 121 Regent Street. Fantastic to now know when it was and who they all are. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/whatsthatpicture/4980022193/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/whatsthatpicture/4980022787/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 26808453@N03
comment._content:
Excellent work James. I'll pass this on to our curators to see if they can shed any further light. I'm sure between them and your man at the RPS, we can complete the picture.
-Emma
